{
    /// <summary>
    /// Maps all generated mediator endpoints

    public static global::Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IEndpointRouteBuilder MapGeneratedMediatorEndpoints(this global::Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IEndpointRouteBuilder builder)
    {

        // UserHandler - GetUser
        builder.MapMediatorGet<Test.GetUserRequest, Test.UserResponse>(
            "/users/{id}"
        )
            .WithName("GetUser")
            .RequireAuthorization("AdminPolicy")
            .WithDisplayName("Get User by ID")
            .WithSummary("Retrieves a user")
            .WithDescription("Gets a user by their unique identifier")
            .WithTags("Users", "Admin")

            .RequireCors("DefaultCors")
            .RequireRateLimiting("DefaultRateLimit")
        ;
        return builder;
